Financial Leadership.description: My tenure as Director of Finance for the UofT Student Team for Amateur Rocketry has honed my ability to manage complex technical budgets. I successfully oversaw financial allocation for high-stakes engineering projects, ensuring resource efficiency without compromising on technical goals.

Python & Automation.description: I have a strong background in using Python for practical automation. For example, I developed a custom web scraper to optimize reward point redemptions, which required reverse-engineering web protocols and handling large datasets efficiently.

Reinforcement Learning.description: My passion for AI is demonstrated by my work on a Reinforcement Learning-based movement sandbox. Built in LuaU, this project involved designing reward functions and training agents to navigate complex 3D environments autonomously.

Web Development.description: I bring hands-on web development experience, having served as a Web Design Instructor at Thunderbird Community Centre. This role required not only technical mastery of HTML/CSS but also the ability to communicate complex technical concepts clearly to others.
